00020   // no floats for the moment

00022 
00023   enum EDoubleLFValues {k_Constant_DoubleLF,
00024                         k_Constant_Error_DoubleLF,
00025                         k_Constant_Reference_Point_DoubleLF,
00026                         k_Constant_Reference_Point_Error_DoubleLF,
00027                         k_Slope_DoubleLF,
00028                         k_Slope_Error_DoubleLF,
00029                         kNDoubleLFValues};
00030 
00037   class LinearFitCompound : public lcio::LCFixedObject<kNIntLFValues,
00038                             kNFloatLFValues,
00039                             kNDoubleLFValues> {
00040 
00041   public:
00042 
00043     LinearFitCompound(lcio::LCObject* obj) : lcio::LCFixedObject<kNIntLFValues,
00044                                                                  kNFloatLFValues,
00045                                                                  kNDoubleLFValues
00046                                                                  >(obj){}
00047 
00048     LinearFitCompound(const LinearFitConstant* lfc, const LinearFitSlope* lfs)
00049     {
00050       const int ID = lfc->getID();
00051       obj()->setIntVal(k_ID_IntLF, ID);
00052 
00053       const double constant       = lfc->getConstant();
00054       const double constant_error = lfc->getConstantError();
00055       obj()->setDoubleVal(k_Constant_DoubleLF, constant);
00056       obj()->setDoubleVal(k_Constant_Error_DoubleLF, constant_error);
00057 
00058       const double constant_reference_point       = lfc->getConstantReferencePoint();
00059       const double constant_reference_point_error = lfc->getConstantReferencePointError();
00060       obj()->setDoubleVal(k_Constant_Reference_Point_DoubleLF, constant_reference_point);
00061       obj()->setDoubleVal(k_Constant_Reference_Point_Error_DoubleLF, constant_reference_point_error);
00062 
00063       const double slope       = lfs->getSlope();
00064       const double slope_error = lfs->getSlopeError();
00065       obj()->setDoubleVal(k_Slope_DoubleLF, slope);
00066       obj()->setDoubleVal(k_Slope_Error_DoubleLF, slope_error);
00067 
00068     }
00069 
00070     LinearFitCompound(int ID,
00071                       double constant,
00072                       double constant_error,
00073                       double constant_reference_point,
00074                       double constant_reference_point_error,
00075                       double slope,
00076                       double slope_error)
00077     {
00078 
00079       obj()->setIntVal(k_ID_IntLF, ID);
00080 
00081       obj()->setDoubleVal(k_Constant_DoubleLF, constant);
00082       obj()->setDoubleVal(k_Constant_Error_DoubleLF, constant_error);
00083 
00084       obj()->setDoubleVal(k_Slope_DoubleLF, slope);
00085       obj()->setDoubleVal(k_Slope_Error_DoubleLF, slope_error);
00086 
00087       obj()->setDoubleVal(k_Constant_Reference_Point_DoubleLF, constant_reference_point);
00088       obj()->setDoubleVal(k_Constant_Reference_Point_Error_DoubleLF, constant_reference_point_error);
00089 
00090     }
00091 
00097     double eval(double x)
00098     {
00099       const double y = getConstant() + (x - getConstantReferencePoint()) * getSlope();
00100       return y;
00101     }
00102 
00103     double evalErr(double x, double x_error)
00104     {
00105       const double error2 = pow(getConstantError(), 2)
00106         + pow(getSlope(), 2) * (pow(x_error, 2) + pow(getConstantReferencePointError(), 2))
00107         + (x*x + pow(getConstantReferencePoint(), 2)) * pow(getSlope(), 2);
00108 
00109       return sqrt(error2);
00110     }
00111 
00112 
00113 
00116     int getID() const {
00117 
00118       return getIntVal(k_ID_IntLF);
00119 
00120     }
00121 
00125     double getConstant() const {
00126 
00127       return getDoubleVal(k_Constant_DoubleLF);
00128 
00129     }
00130 
00133     double getConstantError() const {
00134 
00135       return getDoubleVal(k_Constant_Error_DoubleLF);
00136 
00137     }
00138 
00141     double getSlope() const {
00142 
00143       return getDoubleVal(k_Slope_DoubleLF);
00144 
00145     }

00151       return getDoubleVal(k_Slope_Error_DoubleLF);

00153     }

00161     }

00169     }

00238     const std::string getTypeName() const {
00239       return "LinearFitCompound";

00247     const std::string getDataDescription() const {
00248       return "i:ID,"
00249         "f:constant,"
00250         "f:constant_error,"
00251         "f:slope,"

00263   inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out,
00264                                   const CALICE::LinearFitCompound& lfr) {
00265 
00266     out << "ID: " << lfr.getID()
00267         << " constant: " << lfr.getConstant()
00268         << " constant error: " << lfr.getConstantError()
00269         << " constant reference point: " << lfr.getConstantReferencePoint()
00270         << " constant reference point error: " << lfr.getConstantReferencePointError()
00271         << " slope: " << lfr.getSlope()
00272         << " slope error: " << lfr.getSlopeError();
